name: Concrete Calculator
author: Md. Sarwar-A-Kawsar

sections.description:
This plugin will calculator your concrete volume with V = L X W X H this formula and it is has a responsive calculator UI. If you want to add concrete calculator in your website just install this plugin.

Here we used metre, milimetre, centimetre, inch, feet and yard as unit. Moreover it won’t conflict any design or your template hence we used unique css classes and core javascript.

You will be happy to see the effective results on your website using this multi-featured plugin. Many big companies and digital marketing agencies are using this plugin to make their work simple.

Digital marketing agencies

If you need any custom calculator plugin please feel free to contact for further disscussion.
Fiverr profile link

Regards
sections.installation: Install the plugin and use [concrete-calculator] shortcode where you want to use this calculator
